DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate metabolic load single session moderate intensity walk water compare walk land ( over-ground ) people chronic obstructive pulmonary disease ( COPD ) normal weight obese , compare peak exercise metabolic response . The hypothesis metabolic load walk moderate intensity water great walk land .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Walking Water Land People With Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease ( COPD )
DOC.criteria: diagnosis COPD ( FEV1/FVC < 0.7 ) clinically stable state ( acute exacerbation COPD within previous 4 week ) accept walk water BMI > /= 21 kg/m2 longterm oxygen therapy contraindication enter hydrotherapy pool
